 2002-06392002-04-180,  ,  HERITAGE,  , 
PrecisEnactment of (a) an Order excluding anyone who would otherwise have a righ to appeal an appointment made from a pre-qualified pool from the operation of section 21 of the Act, and (b) the PREQUALIFIED POOL RECOURSE REGULATIONS which provide for an individual interest based recourse process and an independent third party review of departmental decisions.
